Instruction: Rinse the fresh cranberries under cold water and discard any stems or blemished berries.
In a saucepan, combine the fresh cranberries, orange zest, orange juice, granulated sugar, ground cinnamon, and ground cloves.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the cranberries burst and the mixture thickens, about 10-15 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature.
Transfer the cranberry orange relish to a serving dish.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a tangy and sweet side dish.
